Package org.apache.solr.morphlines.cell

Morphlines Solr Cell related code.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SolrCellBuilder
    Command that pipes the first attachment of a record into one of the given Tika parsers, then maps the Tika output back to a record using SolrCell.
    StripNonCharSolrContentHandlerFactory
    SolrContentHandler and associated factory that strips non-characters and trims on output.
    TrimSolrContentHandlerFactory
    SolrContentHandler and associated factory that trims field values on output.

Package org.apache.solr.morphlines.cell Description

Morphlines Solr Cell related code.
